prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited in the Library by Mr. Harry L. Wise of Charlestown, West Virginia, on July 29, 1983.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of 3 items (electrostatic copies), 1976, between the American Rhododendron Societyand the trustees for the establishment of the Research Foundationof the Society; a typescript of the "American Rhododendron Society Information Notebook"; and a letter, August 6, 1982, by Harry L. Wiseto Ed Egan, executive secretary of the Society, commenting on the notebook.
